name: eManager File Packaging Information
summary: Learn about .XEP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: X-Genics eManager is a content management suite (CMS) that allows businesses to monitor and report on business performance and process compliance, using X-Genics SmartApps. XEP files describe where these SmartApps and other eManager components are stored after they're installed in eManager.

instructions: XEP files are not meant to be opened. X-Genics eManager references XEP files when installing and unpacking components.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
